backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, artist data, artworks, submissions, inquiries, and permission‑checked CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transfers all stored maps and counters unchanged from old to new state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page with root mount point loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, routes, layout, and theme provider for the frontend app.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Admin table view listing all purchase inquiries with artwork info and buyer details.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReplaceDat: Admin control that triggers dataset replacement with confirmation dialog and status handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays a table of artwork submissions with image previews and actions to approve or reject each submission.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Form for creating an artist profile with validation, success messaging, and optional callback on completion.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form for editing artwork details and optionally updating the image, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, rendering appropriate messages or children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile, including optional avatar upload and validation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Displays an artwork preview card with image lightbox and navigation to the artwork detail page.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryF: Provides category and sort dropdown controls for filtering gallery items.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Displays artwork images with loading, validation, and graceful error handling.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Full-screen dialog lightbox for viewing artwork images with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Modal form for submitting purchase inquiries with validation and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, authentication controls, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Displays a confirmation card after artwork submission with navigation options.
Form for submitting new artwork with image upload, draft saving, and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, reloading on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and managing submissions and purchase inquiries, including approve/reject actions with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Supplies hooks to fetch all artists, fetch a specific artist, get the caller's artist profile, and create a new profile with appropriate cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Contains hooks to fetch all artworks or a specific artwork by ID using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Implements hooks for retrieving and saving the caller’s user profile and checking admin authorization.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteArtwork.ts: Defines a mutation for deleting an artwork and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Provides a mutation to edit artwork details and refreshes related artwork and submission queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches artwork submissions belonging to the current authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Offers a mutation to submit a purchase inquiry and invalidates inquiry-related queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplaceDataset.ts: Runs a dataset replacement mutation and invalidates all major data queries to refresh the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Provides a mutation for submitting new artwork and updates artwork and submission queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, plus layout utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for submissions, inquiries, and dataset replacement.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist’s profile and filters artworks belonging to that artist, with navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Displays a list of artists with loading and empty states, each linking to an artist profile.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed artwork info with image lightbox, owner actions, and purchase inquiry flow.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated, owner‑only form to edit artwork details with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders the main gallery with filtering, sorting, and loading behavior for artworks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and navigation CTAs to explore or submit artwork.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update profile info and avatar with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Shows a submission form for new artwork and displays confirmation after successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image file to a data URL with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting GBP monetary values.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Provides functions to validate image URLs and return user-friendly error messages for invalid or failed image loads.
frontend/src/utils/submitArtworkDraft.ts: Implements sessionStorage-based save, load, and clear operations for artwork submission drafts with basic structure validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom themes, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements for implementing stable storage, automatic upgrade migration, and persistence of user and upload data across canister upgrades.
